function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption of construction projects due to epidemics","Impact":"Halting of projects, financial losses, and economic slowdown","Mitigation":"Implementation of remote work solutions, strict health and safety measures, and contingency plans","Technologies":"Remote project management tools, virtual collaboration platforms, and health monitoring technologies","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, government authorities, and health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Financial losses in construction companies","Impact":"Bankruptcy, job losses, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Fiscal stimulus, government support, and cost reduction strategies","Technologies":"Financial planning software, economic forecasting tools, and project cost management systems","People":"Construction companies, employees, and investors","Owner":"Government authorities, financial institutions, and construction company management"},{"Description":"Unreliable space for foreign direct investment (FDI) in construction projects","Impact":"Reduced investment, economic slowdown, and decline in job opportunities","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate strategies to attract FDI and ensuring a safe and stable business environment","Technologies":"Investment promotion platforms, economic forecasting tools, and risk assessment software","People":"Investors, government agencies, and economic development organizations","Owner":"Government authorities, investment promotion agencies, and construction industry stakeholders"}]}
